overview_of_class: This course will be focused on song selection, coaching and rehearsals for Chicago Showcase, along with additional instruction on transitioning into the industry, career preparation, psychology of auditioning, selecting head shots and resumes, communicating with agents and casting directors, as well as how to approach and prepare taxes as a working artist. The class will also offer instruction simultaneously with a Voice and Acting teacher. Enrollment in this class is required if student intends on participating in the Chicago Showcase. Please contact Matt Hawkins for permission numbers and with questions about the class. matt.hawkins@northwestern.edu.
